title: More Judahite Genealogies and Jabez’s Prayer
summary: The genealogy of the tribe of Judah continues. One notable moment is Jabez’s prayer for blessing and expansion, which God answers. The chapter also lists descendants of Simeon.

faq.question: Who was Jabez?
faq.answer: A man who prayed for God’s blessing, and his prayer was granted.

faq.question: What other tribe is listed here?
faq.answer: The descendants of Simeon, another son of Jacob.
